metadata.title: Meble - 3D Furniture Design
metadata.description: Professional 3D furniture design tool. Create, visualize and export furniture projects.

hero.title: Design furniture in 3D like a pro
hero.description: Professional furniture design tool. Create wardrobe, cabinet and other furniture projects in your browser. Export cut lists for production.

benefits.title: Why use our tool
benefits.description: Complete furniture design solution - from 3D visualization to ready cut lists.

1.title: Interactive preview
1.description: Rotate and zoom your project in real-time.

2.title: Materials and colors
2.description: Choose from a library of materials and colors.

video.title: How it works
video.description: Watch a short presentation showing the furniture design process from idea to cut list.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.description: Join our community of satisfied furniture designers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions.

1.question: Is the app free?
1.answer: Yes, the basic version of the app is completely free.

2.question: Can I use it commercially?
2.answer: Yes, you can use the app to design furniture for sale.

3.question: How do I export projects?
3.answer: Use the CSV export function to generate a production-ready cut list.

4.question: Do you offer technical support?
4.answer: Yes, we offer email support and online documentation.

cta.title: Ready to design?
cta.description: Start creating professional furniture designs today.

footer.description: Professional 3D furniture design tool. Create, visualize and export projects.
